Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 103 of 261 1264
LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross
1 A. No.
2 Q. Well, let me show you -- I'm going to ask you to look at your tab.
3 
4 THE COURT: Tell the government and me the tab first.
5 MS. STERNHEIM: I'm getting to it, Judge. Just a moment. I'm going to refer the government, the Court, and Kate to the tab 3513-019, and it may be at 019.
6 
7 THE COURT: I don't have tabs by 3500.
8 MS. STERNHEIM: May we put it on the screen for the witness and the Court?
9 
10 THE COURT: Sure. But you have to direct the government. Do you have it, Ms. Pomerantz?
11 MS. STERNHEIM: I will show them.
12 MS. POMERANTZ: Yes, your Honor, I have it. Thank you.
13 
14 THE COURT: Thank you.
15 MS. STERNHEIM: This one.
16 MS. POMERANTZ: Yes. Thank you.
17 
18 BY MS. STERNHEIM:
19 Q. Kate, do you see what is marked as 3513-019?
20 A. Yes.
21 Q. Do you recognize that?
22 A. Yes.
23 Q. Do you recognize that to be email correspondence that you had with Jeffrey Epstein?
24 
25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018440
